Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by New York (N) in 2014...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/8/2014, off Jerome Williams (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/2014, off Roy Oswalt (PHI)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2016, hitting .418 with 10 HR, 35 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/10/2016, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 9 RBI against Colorado on 6/6/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 4/13/2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $25,000,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .409 with 12 HR, 37 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Los Angeles (N), driving in 7 runs on 7/9/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/11/2020, hitting .591 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2020, hitting .362 with 51 HR, 132 RBI...
Injured on 5/3/2021 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2021, hitting .458 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 6/17/2022...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2022, hitting .365 with 11 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/19/2022, hitting .412 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 33-game hitting streak snapped on 7/26/2022...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2022, hitting .458 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Washington on 4/17/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2023, hitting .520 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 5/15/2023...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
